title: One high school boy and one high school girl meet in their dream and change themselves with each other in real world.
review: I'm surprised when I watch this film, because I have never seen the story like this. This movie is a little strange. I also can't understand this story perfectly. I think time axis change twice or three times in this movie, so this is a ;ittle complex story, but it makes this story more interesting. After we watch this movie, we can talk about this story we can't understand about.This story uses back music.The back music seems not back music but main music. The music is really good and suits this movie very much. In addition, this movie uses not cut but a song. It's also nice.
